message: Let's be fair, Bob. This offer leaves us both with a good deal.
Alice, my turn! I'm feeling generous, but let's make this quick. This offer is better than what you'll get in future rounds.
Bob, this is my final offer.  It's a good deal considering the inflation, and waiting longer only hurts you more than me.
Alice, this is getting ridiculous. Take this offer before inflation eats away at your share even more. It's my final offer!
